Reviews.Title: Easy to setup and use, but low image quality
Reviews.Author: EricB

ProductInfo.Features:
7-Inch TFT LCD Screen
Access live video footage directly from your iPhone or BlackBerry Smart Phone
H.264 video compression lets you record over a month of footage
Let the coaching iMenu teach you about the DVR's settings and features
Multiple viewing options allow you to connect up to two televisions and a VGA monitor
24/7 Lifetime live customer support is available through phone, email, and live web chat
ProductInfo.Name: Defender SN502-4CH-001 4-Channel H.264 DVR with 4 Indoor/Outdoor Night Vision Cameras - Black
